abstract: Author and former reporter Jane Gross Op-Ed article argues mismatch between what is covered by Medicare and what is actually useful is the central flaw of the program; asserts that the elderly benefit and need chronic care more than acute care, and yet no one is addressing the issue save the insular community of long-term care providers.
snippet: The truth about Medicare: what it pays for is not what most recipients need or want.
lead_paragraph: The truth about Medicare: what it pays for is not what most recipients need or want.
